hotels.description: Experience a serene stay among the rainforest-clad foothills of New Zealand’s Southern Alps at this retreat nestled in the alpine town of Franz Josef. A stay in one of Rainforest Retreat’s self-contained havens is the perfect way to enjoy this slice of secluded paradise. Embrace nature suspended above the lush rainforest canopy and breathe fresh alpine air from your expansive deck area. When adventure calls, take to the water and embark on a kayaking adventure on Ōkārito Lagoon, marvel at Lake Mapourika's shimmering surface or discover the awe-inspiring Franz Josef Glacier or Fox Glacier on a helicopter tour. After a day of exploring, unwind at Monsoon Restaurant & Bar, the retreat’s lively hub, where hearty local fare, crackling fires and a well-stocked bar invite you to relax.
